news.title: Tech founders call on Sequoia Capital to denounce VC Shaun Maguire's Mamdani comments
news.summary: Shaun Maguire, an outspoken Trump supporter, is getting publicly criticized for recent posts about New York City Democratic mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani.

news.title: CNBC's Most Valuable Sports Empires 2025: Here's how the top 20 empires in the world stack up
news.summary: The world's 20 most valuable sports ownership groups are worth a combined $225 billion, according to CNBC's Most Valuable Sports Empires 2025.

news.title: 'Big beautiful bill' may help some seniors on Social Security. But it doesn't eliminate taxes on benefits
news.summary: Experts weigh in on the tax relief some seniors may expect to see. President Donald Trump has signed the "big beautiful" bill into law.

news.title: Trump announces steep tariffs on 14 countries starting Aug. 1
news.summary: President Donald Trump shared screenshots of signed form letters dictating new tariff rates to the leaders of 14 countries. President Donald Trump, in social media posts, shared screenshots.

news.title: 'Revenge savings' can boost your bottom line, experts say — here's how to get started
news.summary: Saving more money is a perennial resolution, but emotions shouldn't drive that habit, financial experts say. Instead, be intentional. Here's how to get started.

news.title: How to use AI to find the best Amazon Prime Day deals
news.summary: Generative-AI models can help shoppers find the best deals this Prime Day. More consumers are using artificial intelligence to shop, and generative- AI models can be used to help.

news.title: Treasury rout grows as tariffs and supply test demand after tax and spending bill
news.summary: U.S. government debt will face a crucial test from investors this week. The Treasury is readying a series of Treasury auctions to raise cash.

news.title: Goldman Sachs lifts its S&P 500 forecasts. Strategists say these three investment moves are crucial.
news.summary: Goldman say resilient earnings, earlier and bigger Fed rate cuts and more investor buying of stocks will drive the S&P 500 higher from here.

news.title: WeightWatchers emerges from bankruptcy, and it’s now taking aim at menopause
news.summary: WeightWatchers stock was surging after the company emerged from bankruptcy two months after it was announced. WeightWatcher’s stock is now up more than 30%.

news.title: Here’s what is most likely to cause a summer market crisis, according to Deutsche Bank
news.summary: The third quarter can often be accompanied by market turmoil. With thin liquidity and lots of market players absent, the third quarter is often a volatile time.
